abilities.description: Re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by friendly THUNDERSTRIKE units while they are wholly within 12" of this model.
abilities.name: Thunderstrike

description: A mighty warrior and leader of the Stormcast Eternals, wielding a powerful weapon and inspiring nearby units.
name: Lord-Celestant

abilities.description: Roll a dice for each wound or mortal wound allocated to a model armed with a Sigmarite Shield. On a 6, the wound is negated.
abilities.name: Sigmarite Shields

description: Mighty warriors armed with powerful warhammers and shields, forming the backbone of the Stormcast Eternals forces.
name: Liberators
